Package com.netspective.sparx.xaf.form.field

Provides the customizable fields that are added to Dialogs; Dialogs are HTML forms that contain one or more of the DialogField instances such as TextField, BooleanField, or SelectField.

Package com.netspective.sparx.xaf.form.field Description

Provides the customizable fields that are added to Dialogs; Dialogs are HTML forms that contain one or more of the DialogField instances such as TextField, BooleanField, or SelectField.
